title: Stephen A. Smith and Jeff Van Gundy
description:
Zach talks to ESPN's Stephen A. Smith about the new-look Lakers, the Nets as favorites, the Knicks and Damian Lillard, and more; then ESPN's Jeff Van Gundy stops by to talk about Team USA in Tokyo and the biggest offseason moves. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
